price: Nokorε sε wͻn a wͻ’ka sε: “YɛWura ne Nyankopͻn na afei wͻgyina (pintinn) no, ehu biara nni wͻn so (wͻ Wusͻreε da no) na wͻn werε nso nho.
arabic: إِنَّ ٱلَّذِينَ قَالُواْ رَبُّنَا ٱللَّهُ ثُمَّ ٱسۡتَقَٰمُواْ فَلَا خَوۡفٌ عَلَيۡهِمۡ وَلَا هُمۡ يَحۡزَنُونَ

version.title: Ashanti Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Ashanti by Sheikh Haroun Ismaeel

meta.transliteration: inna alladhīna qālū rabbunā al-lahu thumma is'taqāmū falā khawfun ʿalayhim walā hum yaḥzanūna
